UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity determinants in antifungal plant defensins MsDef1 and MtDef4 with different modes of action against Fusarium graminearum.
Literature.Author: Sagaram US, Pandurangi R, Kaur J, Smith TJ, Shah DM

Literature.Title: Plant Defensin Peptides have Antifungal and Antibacterial Activity Against Human and Plant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Sathoff AE, Velivelli S, Shah DM, Samac DA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium graminearum PH-1(IC50=3µM),Fusarium graminearum PH-1(MIC=6µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 7F-3(IC50=7.1±0.8µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 31F-3(IC50=6.9±0.8µM),Ascochyta medicaginicola STC(IC50=7.3±0.7µM),Ascochyta medicaginicola WS-2(IC50=5.3±0.7µM),Colletotrichum trifolii FG-1(no activity data),Colletotrichum trifolii WS-5(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MF-1(no activity data),Rhizoctonia solani(IC50=6.0±1.0µM),Fusarium tricinctum(IC50=14.7±1.3µM),Fusarium incarnatum(no activity data),Xanthomonas alfalfae subsp. alfalfae F3(IC50=11.4±0.2µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae ALF3(IC50=3.4±0.4µM),Serratia marcescens(IC50=8.4±1.0µM),Klebsiella aerogenes(IC50=2.3±0.3µM),Enterococcus casseliflavus(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(IC50=2.7±0.1µM)
